content: this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 vanilla dishcloth is a simple easy dishcloth worked in garter stitch on a diagonal - corner to corner while the pattern was initially designed for worsted / aran weight yarn it also includes instructions that will allow you to knit the dishcloth in different yarn weight this pattern has been tech edited and test knit **sizes** one size - width 18 cm 7 length 18 cm 7 **materials** **yarn ** 40 m 45 yds of paris drops - 100% cotton 75 m 82 yds per 50g or similar worsted / aran weight category 4 - medium yarn sample worked in colorway 17 off-white **needles ** 5 mm us 8 straight or circular needles or to fit gauge **notions ** tapestry needle **gauge** 18 stitches x 28 row in 10x10 cm 4x4 in garter stitch blocked 1 https //whileberry com/blog/vanilla-dishcloth-towel-free-knitting-pattern
